free.question: Is it free?
free.answer: Yes, the service is completely free. You can create any number of tests, share them, and receive responses without restrictions. In the future, advanced features may appear, but the basic functionality will always remain free.

registration.question: Do I need to register?
registration.answer: Registration is not required to take tests — just open the link. However, to create tests, save them, view results, and manage question structures, you'll need an account.

editing.question: Can I edit a test after publishing?
editing.answer: Yes, you can change questions, answer options, and test settings at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and users will see the updated version when they open the test next.

noAccount.question: Can users take the test without an account?
noAccount.answer: Yes, this is one of the key features. Users simply open the link and can start taking the test immediately. This is convenient for quick surveys, questionnaires, and feedback.
